---
description: The Typography component is used to customize the written content
labels: ['typography', 'fonts', 'Inter', 'utilities']
---

import {
    Typography,
    header1,
    header2,
    header3,
    header4,
    header5,
    bodyLarge,
    bodyMedium,
    bodyExtraSmall,
    bodySmall,
    boldLarge,
    boldMedium,
    boldSmall,
    boldExtraSmall,
    TypographyOptions,
} from './typography';
import './fonts/Inter-Web/inter.css';

### Install

```js
// with npm
npm i @partnerhero/phds.utilities.typography;

// with yarn
yarn add @partnerhero/phds.utilities.typography;
```

### Import Typography

```js
// import the Typography and the needed typography styles with TypographyOptions

import {
    Typography,
	TypographyOptions,
} from '@partnerhero/phds.utilities.typography;
```

### Live Examples

### Body

#### Large

```js live
<div style={{ padding: '20px' }}>
    <Typography color="black" variant="bodyLarge">
        {/* uncomment the line below to see all the styles related to bodyLarge */}
        {/* (margin will be missing) */}
        {/* {bodyLarge} <b/>*/}
        Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam eget condimentum
        velit, ut volutpat quam. Vivamus condimentum sit amet velit et tempus.
    </Typography>
</div>
```


```js live
<div style={{ padding: '20px' }}>
    <div style={{ width: '250px', background: 'rgb(214, 214, 214)' }}>
        {/*  Use the margin prop to override the default margin of the typography.*/}
        {/*  Use the align prop to align the typography on the center or on the right side.*/}
        <Typography
            color="black"
            variant="boldLarge"
            margin="20px 1px 10px 20px"
            align="right"
        >
            Right Alignment
        </Typography>
        <Typography
            color="black"
            variant="boldLarge"
            margin="10px 20px 10px 20px"
            align="center"
        >
            Center Alignment
        </Typography>
        <Typography
            color="black"
            variant="boldLarge"
            margin="10px 20px 20px 1px"
        >
            Left Alignment - Default
        </Typography>
    </div>
</div>
```

### Full Usage Example

```js
// install styled-components in your project
// npm i styled-components
// import styled and ThemeProvider from styled-components
import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';

// import Typography
import { Typography } from '@partnerhero/phds.utilities.typography';

interface AppProps {
    color: ThemeTypes;
    typography: TypographyTypes;
}

export const App = ({ color, typography }: AppProps) => {
    return (
        <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
            <Typography color="success" variant="boldLarge">
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam
                eget condimentum velit, ut volutpat quam. Vivamus condimentum
                sit amet velit et tempus.
            </Typography>
        </ThemeProvider>
    );
};
```
